| HistoryText             = 
The Cirque de la Revolution were a group of circus artists turned revolutionaries during [[World War II]]. They allied with [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America (Steven Rogers)]], [[James Buchanan Barnes (Earth-616)|Bucky (James Barnes)]], and [[Howling Commandos (WWII) (Earth-616)|Howling Commandos]] when they went on a mission in [[Paris]] to defeat the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull (Johann Shmidt)]].{{r|Captain America: White Vol 1 3}}

Their actions beyond that event aren't known.
